title: From Blank Canvas to Bold Brand: Designing & Building the Digital Presence for Cookie Jar Tech
subtitle: A 0-to-1 project combining UI/UX, illustration, and front-end development to launch a memorable tech hiring platform in Lithuania.

sections.title: The Opportunity: Cutting Through the Noise
content: Cookie Jar Tech is a Lithuania-based tech hiring platform that connects companies with vetted developers—without the hassle of traditional HR. The aim was to create a bold, energetic, and modern web presence that reflects their no-nonsense, developer-first attitude.
The opportunity was to build a digital presence from scratch that would immediately signal their core values: speed, transparency, and a developer-first attitude.

role.title: My Role: The End-to-End Digital Creator
role.description: As the sole designer and developer, I was responsible for the entire project lifecycle, from initial concept to the final, live website.

contributions.title: UI/UX Design
contributions.description: Designed a bold and approachable layout focused on clarity and fast navigation. The interface is friendly but professional, echoing the company's mission to make hiring stress-free.

contributions.title: Illustration & Animation
contributions.description: Created a full set of custom illustrations and iconography to represent services and concepts playfully. Integrated Lottie animations and micro-interactions to bring the brand personality to life.

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Developed the entire site using Webflow. Ensured responsive layouts, fluid interactions, and minimal JS where needed for performance. Used Webflow’s native animation features to deliver a lively user experience.

sections.title: The Impact: A Memorable Digital Experience
sections.description: The final product is a direct reflection of the initial goal: a bold, energetic, and modern web presence that breaks away from the traditional tech hiring mould.
highlights: Strong branding with a fun, modern tone that breaks away from traditional tech hiring platforms.
Fully animated hero section and interactive illustrations to engage users.
Highly responsive across all devices, with fluid transitions and subtle micro-interactions.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: This project showcases the power of combining clear UX strategy, playful yet informative visuals, and performance-optimized development.
It proved how branding, design, and motion can elevate a niche service platform into a memorable digital experience.
Handling all three roles (design, illustration, development) allowed for a fluid workflow and a more polished final product.

title: Decentralized Communication, Simplified: Designing a Unified dApp for Chat, Mail, and Transactions
subtitle: A 0-to-1 project building a secure, privacy-focused communication platform using native Web Components and the FLO blockchain.

sections.title: The Problem: The Fragmentation of Decentralized Apps
content: RanchiMall Messenger is a decentralized communication platform designed to combine chat, mail, and blockchain-based multisig transactions—all within a secure, privacy-focused interface. The goal was to create a walletless, user-friendly dApp experience that feels familiar yet offers the power of blockchain under the hood.
The core challenge was to unify these fragmented services and abstract away the technical complexity that often serves as a barrier to user adoption in the blockchain space.

role.title: My Role: Lead Architect & UI/UX Designer
role.description: Built entirely with native Web Components and vanilla JavaScript, this project pushed the boundaries of what’s possible in the browser without any framework overhead.

contributions.title: UI/UX Design
contributions.description: Designed an intuitive interface that seamlessly integrates chat, mail, and multisig transaction functionalities, ensuring a user-friendly experience across devices.

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Implemented the application using native Web Components and JavaScript, focusing on performance, responsiveness, and a modular architecture.

contributions.title: Blockchain Integration
contributions.description: Integrated FLO blockchain features to enable decentralized messaging and multisig transactions without requiring users to download a wallet.

sections.title: The Process: From Technical Challenge to Seamless Experience
sections.description: The primary goal was to abstract away the complexity of the blockchain and present a familiar interface to the user.

phases.title: Phase 1: Architecting a 'Walletless' Experience
phases.description: The biggest UX challenge was removing the need for browser extensions. I designed an onboarding flow where user identities are derived from a securely generated public and private key pair, lowering the barrier to entry significantly.

media.alt: A diagram illustrating the walletless user authentication flow

phases.title: Phase 2: Designing a Unified & Contextual Interface
phases.description: I intentionally adopted a familiar three-column layout (like Slack or Telegram) to make users feel comfortable. Complex actions like transactions are placed contextually within a chat, making them feel like a natural part of the conversation.

media.alt: A screenshot of the chat interface

sections.title: The Impact: Proving the Viability of User-Friendly dApps
sections.description: RanchiMall Messenger successfully demonstrates that the power of blockchain does not have to come at the cost of user experience.
highlights: Seamless integration of chat, mail, and multisig transaction features in a single platform.
Walletless architecture allowing users to interact with blockchain functionalities directly from the browser.
Responsive design ensuring optimal user experience across various devices.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: This project exemplifies the potential of combining blockchain technology with user-centric design to create secure and decentralized communication platforms.
It highlights the importance of intuitive UI/UX in facilitating user adoption of complex technologies.
Building with native web technologies can lead to significant performance and maintainability gains for complex applications.

title: A Lightweight, Multi-Functional Crypto Utility: View, Send, and Convert with Ease
subtitle: A client-side suite of tools allowing users to inspect addresses, construct transactions, and convert keys for multiple blockchains within a single, framework-free interface.

sections.title: The Problem: The Need for a 'Swiss Army Knife' for Crypto
content: Crypto power users often need to use multiple, separate tools for viewing wallets, sending transactions, and converting keys. This process is inefficient and raises privacy concerns.
The goal was to create a single, lightweight 'Swiss Army knife' that combines these essential utilities into one fast, private, and cohesive application that runs entirely in the browser.

role.title: My Role: Lead UI/UX Designer & Front-End Developer
role.description: I was responsible for designing the unified user experience and developing the entire front-end application from scratch.

contributions.title: UI/UX Design
contributions.description: Designed a clean, tab-based interface to seamlessly integrate three distinct functions (Address Viewer, Transaction Sender, Key Converter).

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Engineered the application using native Web Components and vanilla JavaScript for maximum performance and zero dependencies.

contributions.title: API & Blockchain Integration
contributions.description: Integrated a public blockchain explorer API for data fetching and implemented client-side logic for transaction creation and cryptographic key conversion.

sections.title: A Cohesive, Multi-Functional Interface
sections.description: The application was designed with a clear, task-based navigation to house three distinct tools in one place without causing confusion.

images.caption: The 'Address' tab provides a clean, data-first view of any public wallet.
The 'Send' tab offers a clear, step-by-step form for transaction creation.
The 'Convert' tab is a simple utility for cross-chain key and address conversion.

sections.title: The Solution: A Fast, Private, and Versatile Crypto Toolkit
sections.description: The result is a powerful, client-side toolkit that empowers users to perform the most common crypto tasks with speed and confidence.
highlights: Multi-Functional: Seamlessly combines an address viewer, transaction builder, and a cross-chain key converter.
High-Performance & Private: Built as a lightweight, framework-free web app that operates entirely on the client-side.
Intuitive UI: Makes complex actions like transaction creation and data inspection simple and accessible.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: Combining several related, high-frequency tasks into a single, efficient tool creates immense value for users.
A strong, simple information architecture is essential when designing multi-functional applications to prevent user confusion.
Modern browsers are capable of handling complex cryptographic operations, enabling powerful and private client-side tools.

title: Building a Framework-Agnostic Design System with Native Web Components
subtitle: A foundational project to create a reusable, standards-based UI component library designed to accelerate development, ensure consistency, and eliminate framework dependency.

sections.title: The Problem: The High Cost of Inconsistency and Framework Lock-in
content: Standard UI is a lightweight, framework-agnostic library of native Web Components designed to simplify modern front-end development. The goal was to provide developers with reusable, accessible, and performant UI building blocks—without relying on frameworks or complex tooling that lead to inconsistency and technical debt.

role.title: My Role: UI Design System Architect & Front-End Developer
role.description: I was responsible for the entire lifecycle, from high-level strategy to the implementation of each component.

contributions.title: Design System
contributions.description: Defined a cohesive set of UI components with consistent styling, behavior, and accessibility patterns to support scalable application development.

contributions.title: Component Design
contributions.description: Designed and prototyped individual components (buttons, inputs, modals, etc.) with clear API and customization options.

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Implemented each component using native Web Components standards (Custom Elements, Shadow DOM), vanilla JavaScript, and CSS, ensuring performance and interoperability.

sections.title: Architecting for Reusability and Longevity
sections.description: The system was built on the stable foundation of the web platform itself, with a clear token-based design.

sections.title: The Solution: A Lightweight, Standards-Based Component Library
sections.description: The final product is a fully documented library of framework-agnostic components, showcased on a dedicated demo site with interactive examples.
highlights: Standards-compliant components built with Custom Elements and Shadow DOM for encapsulation.
Fully documented demo site showcasing every component with interactive examples.
Lightweight, framework-agnostic, and optimized for accessibility and modular use.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: This project exemplifies the power of native Web Components to build a robust, reusable design system without frameworks.
It underscores the importance of standards-based development, modularity, and documentation in scalable UI architecture.
A well-architected design system solves business problems by increasing development speed and reducing maintenance costs.

title: Designing for Impact: Translating Sustainable Fashion Solutions into a Compelling Digital Platform
subtitle: A mission-driven project using clear UX and custom illustration to advocate for a circular fashion economy.

sections.title: The Problem: The Fashion Industry's Waste Crisis
content: Think Circular is a UK-based initiative dedicated to transforming the fashion industry through sustainable, circular solutions. Their services include stock exit strategies, de-labeling, re-commerce, recycling, repair, and returns management.
The challenge was to create a digital platform that could effectively communicate the urgency of this complex issue and clearly present Think Circular's multifaceted services to potential partners.

role.title: My Role: UI/UX Designer, Illustrator, & Front-End Developer
role.description: I was responsible for translating their mission into a compelling online experience, from initial design to final implementation.

contributions.title: UI/UX Design
contributions.description: Crafted a user-centric layout that guides visitors through the challenges of the fashion industry and Think Circular's solutions, emphasizing clarity and ease of navigation.

contributions.title: Illustration & Graphics
contributions.description: Designed custom illustrations and icons to visually represent key statistics and services, such as the number of garments produced annually. These visuals aid in storytelling and data comprehension.

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Implemented the design on the Wix platform, ensuring responsiveness across devices and integrating interactive elements to maintain brand consistency.

sections.title: Visual Storytelling Through Data & Icons
sections.description: To make the complex data feel urgent and the services easy to understand, I created a full set of custom graphics and icons.

images.caption: Bold data visualizations to highlight the scale of the problem.
A unique, custom icon for each of the six core services.

sections.title: The Solution: An Informative and Action-Oriented Platform
sections.description: The final website effectively communicates Think Circular's mission and services by combining thoughtful UX design, custom illustrations, and responsive development.
highlights: Impactful Storytelling: The homepage presents compelling statistics to immediately convey the urgency of the issue.
Clear Service Breakdown: Each service is detailed with accompanying visuals, providing clear information on how Think Circular addresses the circular economy.
High User Engagement: Integrated contact forms and a persistent WhatsApp link facilitate easy communication and encourage action.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: This project exemplifies the fusion of design and development to create a platform that not only informs but also inspires action.
For data-heavy topics, custom illustrations are far more effective at storytelling and aiding comprehension than text alone.
A clear narrative structure is essential for guiding users through a complex topic and leading them toward a desired action.

title: Crafting an Authentic E-commerce Experience for Vintage-Inspired Homeware
subtitle: A branding and e-commerce project to design and build a Shopify store that blends timeless aesthetics with a seamless, modern shopping experience.

sections.title: The Opportunity: Bringing Timeless Charm to Modern E-commerce
content: Olde Worlde is an artisan-inspired ecommerce brand offering vintage-style ironmongery, lighting, and homeware. The goal was to design a store that felt timeless and authentic—reflecting the heritage and craftsmanship behind each product, while still providing an intuitive modern shopping experience.

role.title: My Role: Brand Designer, UI/UX Designer, & Shopify Developer
role.description: I was responsible for the end-to-end execution, ensuring a cohesive experience from the logo to the checkout button.

contributions.title: Brand Identity
contributions.description: Crafted a distinct brand identity that evokes the charm of vintage craftsmanship, including logo, color palette, and typography direction.

contributions.title: UI/UX Design
contributions.description: Designed a clean and elegant layout that balances old-world aesthetics with modern usability, focusing on clear product presentation and seamless Browse.

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Implemented the design using Shopify's templating system, customizing layouts and styling for responsiveness, and ensuring smooth performance and shopping flow.

sections.title: Forging the Brand Identity & User Experience
sections.description: The brand and UI were designed in tandem to create a cohesive and authentic feel, balancing classic aesthetics with modern clarity.

images.caption: The logo, color palette, and typography set the vintage-inspired tone.
Product pages feature large images and clean layouts to showcase craftsmanship.

sections.title: The Solution: A Charming and Intuitive Shopify Store
sections.description: The final result is an e-commerce experience that perfectly mirrors the Olde Worlde brand ethos, inviting users to explore its curated collection.
highlights: Vintage-inspired branding and visual storytelling throughout the store.
Well-organized product categories that guide users effortlessly to their needs.
Fully responsive and accessible experience across all modern devices.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: Olde Worlde demonstrates how thoughtful design and tailored development can create an ecommerce experience that feels both charming and intuitive.
From brand to cart, every detail was crafted to match the warmth and quality of the products themselves.
Balancing a unique aesthetic with e-commerce best practices is key to building a successful online store for a niche brand.

title: Building a Sustainable Brand: A Clean & Conscious Shopify Experience
subtitle: An eco-conscious travel luggage store with clean branding and Shopify implementation, built around sustainability and user-friendly shopping.

sections.title: The Opportunity: Cutting Through the Noise in the Travel Gear Market
content: CabinHold is a UK-founded brand offering compact, airline-compatible backpacks made from recycled materials. The goal was to develop its visual identity and implement a full storefront on Shopify, designed to highlight product features, eco values, and a smooth e-commerce flow.

role.title: My Role: Brand Designer, UI/UX Designer, & Shopify Developer
role.description: I led the project from concept to launch, ensuring the brand's sustainable ethos was reflected in every aspect of the final product.

contributions.title: Brand Identity
contributions.description: Created a minimalist logo, color palette, and visual style aligned with eco-aware travel aesthetics.

contributions.title: UI/UX Design
contributions.description: Designed clean product listings and intuitive checkout flows, focusing on sustainable features and easy Browse.

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Built the Shopify site from concept to launch, customizing the theme, mobile views, and product sections for speed and usability.

sections.title: Designing for Trust and Clarity
sections.description: The brand and UI were designed to be clean, honest, and easy to understand, mirroring the brand's sustainable values.

images.caption: A minimalist logo and catchy color palette creates a fresh, eco-conscious vibe.
Product pages clearly highlight key features like recycled materials.

sections.title: The Solution: A Clean, Conscientious, and High-Converting Store
sections.description: The final Shopify store successfully launches the CabinHold brand with a digital presence that is as thoughtful and well-designed as its products.
highlights: Sustainability messaging with visual clarity, reflecting eco-friendly materials and compact sizing.
Straightforward Shopify build with clean navigation, fast product Browse, and responsive layout.
Consistent design system integrating product visuals, iconography, and user-focused copy.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: This project shows how branding and design can elevate a product story—by blending visual clarity, eco values, and a streamlined Shopify experience.
For a DTC brand, clearly communicating the 'why' behind the product is just as important as the product itself.
A minimalist design approach builds trust and helps focus the user's attention on the product's quality and core message.

title: Building Credibility for Complex Tech: A Digital Platform for AI & Robotics Solutions
subtitle: An AI, robotics & computer-vision solutions site built for Cybernetics — featuring intuitive design, clear service presentation, and engaging branding.

sections.title: The Opportunity: Making Advanced Technology Accessible
content: Cybernetics is a Kaunas-based technology company offering AI computer vision, robotic automation, and custom prototyping solutions. The project goal was to create a digital presence that communicates technical credibility while remaining approachable to industrial clients.

role.title: My Role: Brand Designer, UI/UX Designer, & Webflow Developer
role.description: I led the project from branding and visual identity through to a fully responsive Webflow site.

contributions.title: Brand Identity
contributions.description: Developed a clean and modern visual identity with touches of tech-inspired design, including custom logo and color palette.

contributions.title: UI/UX Design
contributions.description: Structured service pages to clearly outline AI vision, robotics, and prototype offerings. Crafted intuitive layouts and navigation to guide industrial clients with clarity.

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Implemented the design using Webflow, building out CMS structures, service sections, and interactive elements to present advanced technology in a simple, professional format.

sections.title: Designing for Trust and Clarity
sections.description: The brand and UI were designed to demystify complex technology and build professional credibility with a B2B audience.

images.caption: Service pages are structured to clearly explain benefits to industrial clients.

sections.title: The Solution: A Professional and Approachable Digital Gateway
sections.description: The final Webflow site serves as a clear digital front door for Cybernetics, effectively communicating their value to their target audience.
highlights: Straightforward presentation of technical services like AI vision and robotic solutions.
Professional branding that balances precision and accessibility.
Responsive and informative layout optimized for industrial and B2B audiences.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: This project demonstrates how thoughtful design and branding can make complex technology accessible and trustworthy.
By aligning visual identity, content, and development on Webflow, the site delivers a clear, professional, and scalable experience.
For B2B tech, the primary goal of a website is to build trust and initiate a conversation.

title: High-Performance Crypto Tracking: A Real-Time Exchange Interface Built with Web Components
subtitle: A real-time cryptocurrency exchange interface displaying live market data, built with a focus on performance and standards-based technology.

sections.title: The Problem: The Performance Lag in Real-Time Data Interfaces
content: Exchange Market is a front-end application that provides a real-time, data-driven view of cryptocurrency trading pairs. The project was conceived as a lightweight, high-performance interface for tracking markets, built entirely with native Web Components to create a modular and efficient market tracker without the overhead of a large framework.

role.title: My Role: UI/UX Designer & Front-End Developer
role.description: I was responsible for designing a data-centric interface and architecting the front-end for maximum performance.

contributions.title: UI/UX Design
contributions.description: Designed a clean, data-centric interface that prioritizes clarity and at-a-glance readability of market statistics. Implemented a responsive layout and a theme-switcher for user comfort (light/dark modes).

contributions.title: Front-End Development
contributions.description: Engineered the application using native Web Components, ensuring a performant, real-time data display. Architected the app for modularity, making individual components reusable and easy to maintain.

contributions.title: Data Integration
contributions.description: Connected the front-end components to a live data source to fetch and display real-time cryptocurrency exchange rates, volumes, and spreads.

sections.title: Architecting for Speed and Data Clarity
sections.description: The UI and architecture were focused on instant data delivery and a clear presentation, including user-centric features like a theme switcher.

images.caption: The UI was designed with a theme switcher for user comfort during long sessions.
A clean, data-centric layout prioritizes at-a-glance readability.

sections.title: The Solution: A Modular and Lightning-Fast Market Tracker
sections.description: The result is a high-performance web application that provides a real-time, data-driven view of cryptocurrency trading pairs.
highlights: Real-time data visualization for multiple cryptocurrency exchange pairs.
Built with native Web Components for exceptional performance and encapsulation, free from framework dependencies.
Features a user-friendly light/dark mode theme switcher for enhanced visual comfort.
Fully responsive design that adapts to various screen sizes.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
points: This project highlights the power of vanilla JavaScript and Web Components for building high-performance, real-time financial data applications.
It demonstrates that for data-intensive UIs, a lightweight, standards-based approach can offer significant advantages in speed and modularity.
Simple user-centric features, like a theme switcher, can dramatically improve the usability of data-heavy applications.
